title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Foreign Language Proficiency and Intercultural Understanding Through Remote Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and beginner-level foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners accurately use over 50 core expressions required in daily workplace situations in the target language.
Learners successfully perform work scenarios reflecting the cultural background of partner countries at least three times.
Learners analyze and propose solutions for at least three conflict cases arising during intercultural communication.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
